title: Limited partnership liable for general partner's
context: [ยง425E-403] Limited partnership liable for general partner&rsquo;s actionable conduct.**** (a) A limited partnership shall be liable for loss or injury caused to a person, or for a penalty incurred, as a result of a wrongful act or omission or other actionable conduct of a general partner acting in the ordinary course of activities of the limited partnership or with authority of the limited partnership. (b) If, in the course of the limited partnership&rsquo;s activities or while acting with authority of the limited partnership, a general partner receives or causes the limited partnership to receive money or property from a person not a partner, and the money or property is misapplied by a general partner, the limited partnership shall be liable for the loss. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1]
